mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: palapuw la. maṟuk lalapgan ci patas ka sinsi’. “tatuli’, pastukung” ma ka pancang.
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: yotas ka ke’ min maha; “sinsi’ ramas su’.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: lunpuw patas ci kaca ga, pasba’an mini lalapuw ci ke’ na itaṟal ni sinsi’.
In class, the teacher taught us the Atayal language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: gunluw min lunpuw sinsi’. mawas min ci awas na lalapuw uṟi.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux ka ke’ na itaṟal wal mu ba’un.
I have learned many Atayal languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: musa’ cu papasba’an ci ke’ karirex. sunbaba’ cu ci ke’ na itaṟal karirex. papungan mu yayan mu.
I go to school every day, I learn the Atayal language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: Pawan ka ralu’ mu.
My name is Pawan.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Pawan。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: Watan ka ralu’ ni yaba’ mu.
My dad’s name is Watan.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Watan。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: Temi ka ralu’ ni yaya’ mu.
My mother’s name is Temi.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Temi。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: malapṟow ka ingkaṟalan mu.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kelan cu tutux na asuṟan malikuṟ, Iyung ka ralu’ ni, malapṟow utux ingkaṟalan ni.
I have a brother, his name is Iyung, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Iyung，他今年11歲。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cel min magaluw lunpuw patas utux papasba’an ci ke’.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sunkisli’ min mawas kora’ cami ci asuṟan mu malikuṟ.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sunkisli’ cu lumanguy. mahnguw ci kaca, magaluw min musa’ lumanguy utux min moṟow.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sunkisli’ cu sunrangi’, anak min magaluw mawas lu lumanguy.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ule’ cu na Itaṟal kung.
I am an Atayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是泰雅族的小孩。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cel maki Sasi’ ka moṟow mu.
Our family lives in Sasi’.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在Sasi’。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ṟamagal ci’uli’ kora’ moṟow mu.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tugal min macsuse’.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: magaluw cu maki’ ci yaba’, yaya’, asuṟan malikuṟ lu asuṟan kanel mu.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: babawi’ ka yaba’ mu, kensacu ka hiya’.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mahikang ka yaya’ mu, ising ka hiya’.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maki’ moṟow ka yaba’ ga, makake’ min ci ke’ na itṟal.
My father speaks the Atayal language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mahnguw min papasba’an ci ke’ ga, musa’ min alang.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: magaluw min kunṟak apatuṟ ci asuṟan mu.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kisli’ mu caṟung ka utux moṟow mu.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: musa’ min salahaw ci yaya’ mu soni’.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pascex ka kaṟal bawi’. ini’ kagahṟa’ lu kakilux ka kaṟal uṟi, bale’ sabihuṟan.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: me’ min ci pang banux raxal ki. cumex hi’ ka wagi’, hulhul caṟung.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: gaben, matanah ka kaṟal la.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kaṟalun mu ka yaya’, hunco’ matanah ka kaṟal la?
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的？

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ba’uw ta’ unel haṟi’ ka behuṟ la maka yaya’.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ungat ṟaṟulung ka kaṟal malahngan, pakaṟek ka hangitux uṟi la.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maha’ min moṟow uṟi la.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tu’uy a’usa moṟow, cumun cu ci hangitux.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: hita ini’ awah ka behuṟ, makmusa cu salahaw na mikung.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cel maki’ syaw na moṟow mu ka papasba’an ci ke’ mu, maskakiy cu karirex musa’ papasba’an ci ke’. maskakiy cu moh moṟow uṟi.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ini’ kayotas ka papasba’an ci ke’ min, ini’ kapayux ka seyto’ uṟi. makakuba’ min kora’.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: masasali’ min patatalaman kora’, magaluw min pasboru’ lu mapatisal.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: magaluw salahaw caminan ka sinsi’ uṟi, yona utux moṟow ka papasba’an ci ke’.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sumopah min karirex, malabu’ ka lalapgan sinpohan mim.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: umu’ garasu’ ruma, sumopah ruma.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sapohan min kora’ ka raṟi’ na papasba’an ci ke’. bale’ min mapuli’ ci pumahun, malabu’ karirex ka papasba’an ci ke’.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: minsa’ min matisal yutasan alang hira’.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: buse’ min ini’ pakakatox la. lunlungun mu caṟung.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: matox kinang ka yutas ga, pakane’an cini ci sikwa lu pa’abon cini ci ocya.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cacibing ka sikwa pinmuhi’ ni yutas. ramas caṟung ni’un.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kisli’ mu ka ocya’ ni yutas uṟi, ramas caṟung abun.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cakan na rex, magaluw cu pahpuy ci yaki’ mu.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: lanlamu’ ka tinahuk cakan rex ni yaki’. kelan na ucyux, gilung, tamurak lu tatacumuri’.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: minani’ min cakan rex laga， musa’ min magal ci ṟagu’ ṟagu’an la.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux ka ngahi’, cehuṟ, kucun bini’ ni yaki’, rasi moṟow ma.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pasugagiy ta’ la! moh cu matox cimunan babuw ni luṟi sun mu ka yaki’.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: rasun mini cika kakelan na asinuw nanahi’ ni sinsi’ soni’. matakaluw min miniy ci kipu balihun.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maṟuk min cika kakelan na asinuw nanahi’ laga, kumaṟal ka sinsi’; “galeng ga, kakabahni’ kora’, bukuy ga kuya’, sahayuw nak matox kora’ mamu.
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34381/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mangugnu’ cu ci kuya’ kung. kani ka aṟat cu paktox ci kukuya’.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux ka kabahni’ intaxan mu, cel mulaka’ kahuni’ bawi’. taxan mu ka kuṟ cel mabel baling kahuni’ ki uṟi.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kelan na zo, ramiy lu ngarux. aṟat cu mintox kinlalayan ci asinuw nanahi’ yonani. ma’as cu caṟung soni’.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux ka sasing pinsasing mu. papaktox mu yaban lu yayan.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: babuw ni pagaluw cu yaba’, yaya’ mu moh luṟi.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pahngagan rex hani, musa’ min matox maman Taytong cami ci asuṟan mu kanel.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pas’aring min Taypey tupanga’ kisya’ nanu’ Taytong.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tehuk Taytong, maras ci ṟaṟulu’ moh magal caminan ka mama’.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ini’ satuhya’ ci moṟow ni mama’ ka eki’. min_gagos tikiy pati’uṟit ci ṟaṟulu’ laga tehuk la.
The station is not far from my uncle's house, and it's just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kelan na banux wasti’ ka syaw moṟow ni mama’. magaluw min paritensya’ musa’ banux ki.
There is a big ranch near my uncle's house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maki’ banux, rasun mini rumanga’ mit lu tupanga’ ramiy ni mama’.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: malahngan, magaluw min musa’ mani’ ci mami’ alang banux.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux la ṟaṟulu’ ka alang banux. kani ka tupanga’ min ci otobay musa’ ki.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pagiy min laga, wal kuri’un ka otobay la. maku min tupanga’ ci basu’ magiy ki.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: nel min tehuk Taypey micuw la. yani wal lon ka otobay ni mama’ laga?
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don't know if my uncle's motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: yuyuk cu ci kaca, maki’ Sasi’ ka moṟow mu. lunpuw cu patas la ga, masuṟigal min Hori’, maki’ min alang banux nanu’ micuw.
When we were young, our family lived in Sasi’. After I started school, we moved to Puli and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在Sasi’，上學以後，就搬到了埔里，一直在都市裡生活。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: musa’ cu tase la ga, lunpuw cu patas gagaṟux na Itaṟal. kaca ka ba’un mu ci masinpayux ka gagaṟux na Yencumincu.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kani ka. mahnguw lunpuw abagan pilaw hani. magaluw cu asuṟan mu malikuṟ musa’ min panaṟit ci nabkis alang. mak ba’un min nak tikiy ka gagaṟux na alang min.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maspat mapgan ka ingkaṟalan naka nabkis hani la. ho’ ga, yona katana’an taxan na.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ana amol na ke’ ka ba’un su’ sun mu. tahṟuti’ caṟung ka ke’ na Itaṟal ni. ba’ ci ke’ na Seediq, Taluw lu Tanah tunux.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Atayal, as well as Seediq, Chinese and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的泰雅語說得很流利，也會說賽德克語、華語和日本語。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: panaṟican mu, kaca ka ba’un mu ci saringan yuyuk sunbaba’ ci ke’ na “Tanah tunux.” ka hiya’. Seediq ka kanel ni, hungel ka Taluw kinuba’un ni mumaṟah. kani ka payux la ke’ ba’un ni kumaṟal.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Seediq, and he knows many Chinese at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是賽德克族人，而他工作上認識許多華人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: makakaṟal min ci kaca ga, payux ka gagaṟux na maloṟak wal sikaṟal naka nabkis hani.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ana min wal ini’ bayi haṟi mung ka ruma’, ho’ ga, wal min pasisingan na nawilung. anak sahyawan mung babuw ni.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: yuyuk cu ci kaca, ini’ mu caṟung bayi ka gagaṟux mu. sikasaṟux mu ka ciragan mu uṟi.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: payux ka kinuba’ mu la ga, tatirahu’ mu galeng na ci’uli’ ka cinragan mu Itaṟal hani,
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Tayal is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為泰雅族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: unel moṟow kira’ malahngan ka suse’ malikuṟ la.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: musa’ min miniy gilung babinaran ci yaki’ mu. sunrama’ ci nani’un gaben ni suse’ malikuṟ.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: muke min babinaran ci ṟagu’, payux ka ṟagu’ nah na hinoṟak.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，有好多新鮮的青菜。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: miniy min ci tamana’, kakuyas lu tolat.
We bought Cabbage, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買高麗菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal ka Lawpan paginbiniy ci buy syaw ki; “cacibing ka saputu’ lu nabahṟi’ mu, biniy tikiy ga!
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: miniy min ci saputu’ lu nabahṟi’.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: muke’ min babinaran ci gilung ki, kumaṟal ka Lawpan; “amol ka binarun su’? maseng ci yaba’ ka gilung soni’, utux ga tugal kbhul.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maskitu’ caṟung ni yaki’ la. panaṟit ci Lawpan maha, ya anak mahyuw tikiy.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mahyuw caṟung la mi Lawpan. iya’ hawi’i la ma.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal kutux ka Lawpan syaw ki, awah miniy ci ucyux mu, yaba’ ci mahyuw ka ucyux mu.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: miniy min ci gilung lu ucyux la. utux rakat ka raramat tinahuk min.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: buse’ min mana’, minakung ka kaṟal la.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: moh nawilung ka suse’ malikuṟ maha, ini’ pahnguw ka sapitay la. babuw pahngagan rex unel cu la.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal ka yaki’; talagay ka tinahuk la. sipalawa’ moh mani’ kora’ laga ma.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: malawa’ min ci raral lu rangi’ moh magaluw mani’ kingaben la.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kelan cu tutux na intana’an, Yawi ka ralu’ ni. ṟumungi’ maras karirex ci angaya’ ni.
I have a classmate named Yawi, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Yawi，他常常忘記帶東西。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: lunpuw min ci patas ga, kuncik ci papatas, papuṟut lu papatasan cika intana’an mu.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: min’utux, minsa’ing, aṟat ga mintugal, pakacikan naha hang.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ho’ ga, ṟakah la a’usa’ ni. kuncik ci angaya’ ga, ini’ bah mubinah.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kani ka ini’ pakacik hiyan ka ci’uli’ la.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cel tutux rex, musa’ min salahaw tanux kora’ min.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: cacka na tu’uy, makmusa’ mastanux ka Yawi, ho’ ga, ṟumungi’ maras ci kulabuy.
On the way, Yawi wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Yawi想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kuncik kulabuy ci intana’an ni. ho’ ga, cumik hiyan kora’ ka laha, ini’ cu nak aras uṟi sun naha.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: maku mangilis ka Yawi pintahlan ni. masang maha; hunco’ mamu ini’ pakacik ci kulabuy kinang!
Yawi burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Yawi急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal hiyan ka intana’an, ya ka ini’ su’ bah maras ka isu’, pinkacik sinang ka angaya’ ga, ini’ su’ pabinahi kora’.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sasan, maṟabuna’ tehuk papasba’an ci ke’ ka Yawi, pabinahun ni mi’ ci intana’an ni kora’ ka angaya’ kincikan ni la.
The next day at school, Yawi arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Yawi很早就到學校了，Yawi把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mastukung ci intana’an ni ka Yawi maha: pa’aras cu nak ci angaya’ babuw ni la. bahbah mamu caṟung, sumoṟal mamu pakacik ci angaya’ kinang.
Yawi apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Yawi向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mpulata’ na ci’uli’ alang ka yaba’ mu.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: yuyuk cu ci kaca, musa maloṟak malahngan ka yaba’ lu mama’ mu, maras ci puting lu hapuni’.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pascex kaṟal laga, nel maras ci asinuw binu’ naha.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ruma’ nak ga, baṟok nanahi’, arat ga ṟapit, tin_git magal ci pikureh uṟi.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: bali’un naha mapuli’ balihun alang hang. a’apuli’ naha ci ci’uli’ alang.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: satanuxan mu karirex ka yaba’ mu. maha cu gunluw hiyan musa’ maloṟak.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: as ka yotas su’ laga, kaca ka rarasun misu’ la mi yaba’.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ming ci luṟang kunṟak ci asinuw nanahi’ ka malikuṟ alang. ba’ sunbale’ ci binong lu katu’.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ba’ caṟung sunbale ci binong ka yaba’ mu. kumaṟal ka yaba’ mu, sikaṟak ci pikureh kani. as ka bali’un ta’ matox ka pinkakayan na asinuw. pacin pinkakayan ni ki ka binong ma.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: umixul cu nahaṟi’ musa’ magaluw maloṟak ci nabkis, sunbaba’ cu sunbale’ ci binong karirex. ini’ kabuse’, kunṟak cubay ci asinuw nanahi’ ka binong mu la.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: matox kinang ka yaba’ ga, kumaṟal maha; maha su’ mananang na mpulata’ ka isu’ babuw ni.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: yotas cu micuw la, mapanga’ cu ci bahuni’ lu panelu’, magaluw cu yaban musa’ maloṟak.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tehuk cu alang laga, apulin mu ci ci’uli’ alang ka asinuw mu.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal ka yaba’ mu maha; pa’asun ka kinnabkisan mi’ ci kinramas itan. kani ka payux la asinuw nanahi’ inagal ta’.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sunṟahu’ cu musa’ papasba’an ci ke’ sasan la.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: musa’ papasba’an ci ke’ ci kaca ga, ṟumungi’ cu maras ci kabang la.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ini’ cu aras ana amol.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: lunpuw min ci kaca ga, magluw cu matox patas intana’an mu.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: macacapung ci kaca ga, kuncik cu papatas laha ci papuṟut ni intana’an mu.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal kinang ka sinsi’ maha, “aṟbuna’ haṟi matatuli’ babuw ni, iya’ saṟahu’ la.”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: Yawi ralu’ naka rangi’ mu caṟung, ule’ na Itaṟal ka hiya’ uṟi.
My good friend’s name is Yawi, and he is also an Tayal child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Yawi，他也是泰雅族的小孩。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: magaluw min lunpuw alang Plngawan.
We study together in the Plngawan tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在萬大部落讀書。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: magaluw min manapung kumaṟal ci insa’ na nabkis rali’ cika nabkis alang. ba’ min kumaṟal caṟung ci ke’ na Itaṟal.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Tayal proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說泰雅語。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: babawi’ ci katuhuṟ cu kung, mahikang ci lalabu’ ka Yawi’.
I am tall and overweight, while Yawi is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Yawi很矮也很瘦。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: matakalang caṟung ka Yawi, kisli’ naha caṟung.
Yawi is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Yawi很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: macacapung matatalang soni’ ka papasba’an ci ke’, lanlamu’ la pacapngan sinrama’ na papasba’an ci ke’.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kelan na mahahuluy, kunlakah boru’, matatalang, maṟuy lu cunbu panelu’.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: macacapung cu matatalang.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: matatalang cu ci kaca ga, matakuṟ cu, masramuṟux ka tari’ mu la.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ho’ ga, matatuli’ cu tumalang na.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tehuk cu puting laga, ma’as matox kora’ ka ci’uli’.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ana cu ini’ agal galeng, ga, ma’as cu, yaka matumasu’ cu macacapung la.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: minsa’ min matisal maman cami ci yaba’ hira’.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ma’ilis ka papak ni mama’ la.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal caminan ka hiya’, kelan tutux na baling ka ramu’uy ma.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: sunbale’ ramu’uy ci kaca ka hiya’ ga, minoh ramu’uy bawi’ mastuw la.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: siaras ci asinuw wanux lu binro ni yaba’ ka mama’.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mapatisal min abelan ci mama’, payux ka ke’ kinaṟal ni.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: pagiy cu ci kaca ga, babawi’ su’ la, muṟaṟing su’ mabatunux uṟi la mi mama’ mu.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal cu maman mu; “bale’ ka papak su’ laga, awah matisal moṟow min babuw ni uṟi la sun mu.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34381/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: 2022 ingkaṟalan ci kaca, wal tutux ka pinkaṟalang na Seyhu, anak patasan ci ralu’ na itaṟal ka mibunsyo ta’ ma.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: panaṟit cu cika se’eneng Temu Numa, buse’ saṟe’ Seyhu ci papatas ralu’ nak na itaṟal ka hiya’.
I interviewed Temu Numa, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Temu Numa。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: masu’ min makaṟal pahngagan rex hani ga, maha’ cu malahang moṟow ni hiyan.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mapatisal min ci kaca ga, bale kumaṟal kinang ci inoh na ralu’ ni. pakuba’ ci tanmoṟow ni lu alang ni uṟi.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kaṟalun mu ka hiya’, hunco’ su’ as ki yunagun matas ci ralu’ na itaṟal ka ralu’ su’? ṟakah ka pinatas rali’ aw? sun mu.
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal kinang ka hiya’, siagal ci hinṟang na ralu’ taluw matas ka ralu’ itaṟal ga, ini’ pala’ulu’ pungan ma. ruma’ ci’uli’ ga, Te sensung sun naha malawa’. maku mapapase ka ci’uli’ mung.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Tie Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34381/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「鐵先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kumaṟal ka Temu Numa maha; patasan nak ci ralu’ itaṟal ka ralu’ ta’ ga, kaca ka ita’ nak caṟung. pinkegal ci lahuṟ itaṟal, tanmoṟow, lu cinragan ta’. hita’ ta’ mulu’ nak ci ralu’ ta’ kora’ ita’ itaṟal.
Temu Numa said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34381/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Temu Numa說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: gunluw cu yaken mu hira’ musa’ cika babainaran. maras ci lanlamu’ na ṟagu’ pinmuhi’ ni nak. tumahuk ci nani’un halan ni maginbiniy uṟi.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: kisli’ naha ka babinaran ni yaki’ ki. payux ci’uli’ miniy ka urik lu nasubi’ ni, habaṟaw ci’uli’ moh tumalang mani’ ci tinahuk ni uṟi.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: ramas caṟung ni’un ka aṟingu’ singut lu rangil tinahuk ni. kelan na asinuw baṟowk nanahi’ pinahnuk na ma’uw uṟi. as rong ci ci’uli ka sinkanaxan ni, moh matikaluw babinaran min kora’ naha.
The pigeon pea soup and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的樹豆湯和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的山胡椒滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: tumahuk ci nani’un ka yaki’ hang ga, tapeh cu ci ci’uli’ sisyaw kung. yotas ka ke’ mu maha, “pinmuhi’ min nak ka ṟagu’ hani. aṟat pinle’an ci ayu’. nahaṟi’ moh miniy!”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34381/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: mingagos tikiy, masu’ min maginbiniy la. kumaṟal ka yaki’ mu maha, “utux ci isu’ ka rumow la,” ma.
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: inohan min hani ga, wal mu ba’un caṟung ka pinmuhi’ lu kinuba’ ci nani’un na itaṟal la. ba’un mu kora’ ka abuk na paginbiniy uṟi la.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

mapitu wagi’ tehuk cu papasba’an ci ke’: taxan mu yonani sunkisli’ nak ci nani’un na kinnabkisan rali’ ka yaki’ mu ga, maku patatiṟuw lu tirahu’ ka linlungan mu.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
